track.name: Mathematics
track.descriptions: Without mathematics, there's nothing you can do. Everything around you is mathematics. Everything around you is numbers.

primary_contest.description:
Code your way to infinity and beyond by competing in Ad Infinitum 16, a mathematics programming contest.

On September 2nd, you’ll have 48 hours to solve 5 challenges.
primary_contest.name: Ad Infinitum 16

model.preview: Determine who needs to be added to the end of the line to restore the pancake to its initial orientation.
model.name: Xrange's Pancakes
